name: OpenLink Data Explorer
description: Adds Linked Data browsing functionality -- across public or private networks -- to host browser.
content_security_policy: script-src https://maps.google.com https://maps.googleapis.com https://mts0.googleapis.com https://mts1.googleapis.com https://maps.gstatic.com 'self' 'unsafe-eval' chrome-extension://chrome; object-src https://maps.google.com https://maps.googleapis.com https://mts0.googleapis.com https://mts1.googleapis.com https://maps.gstatic.com 'self' chrome-extension://chrome; image-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' chrome-extension://chrome  https://; style-src https://fonts.googleapis.com 'self' 'unsafe-inline' chrome-extension://chrome https://; media-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' chrome-extension://chrome https://;
